description: Defines food container properties including servings count, flavor text, and optional tags for categorization.

currentServings.description: The current number of servings remaining in this food item.

maxServings.description: The maximum number of servings this food item can hold.

flavorText.description: Descriptive text about the taste and experience of eating this food.

tags.description: Optional tags for categorizing this food (e.g., 'pastry', 'savory', 'sweet').
